Detailed Description

Nano Database wrapper: This class extends PDO to provide some utility functions such as 'insert', 'update', 'select'

Author:
Matthijs van Henten <matthijs@ischen.nl> Copyright (c) 2009 Matthijs van Henten

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Nano_Db::__construct ( $  config  ) 

Constructor overrides PDO::_construct All configuration options may now be passed as an key => value array

Parameters:
$config array('dbUser'=>'','dbPassword'=>, 'dbHost'=> ... ) etc.
Returns:
Nano_Db $db

$  values = null,
$  style = PDO::FETCH_OBJ,
$  options = null 
)

Wrapper funciton for $sth->fetchAll. Prepares, executses and returns fetchAll

Parameters:
$query Mysql query. Use ':key' or '?' for replacement
$values PDO ':key' => 'value' parameters
$style Fetch Style. defautls to 'objects'

$  where = null,
$  values = null,
$  columns = null

Performs a simple select query ( SELECT * FROM $tableName WHERE $options )

Parameters:
string $table Table to query from
string $where Where clause. use PDO array(':key' => 'value' ) replacements or ?
mixed $values PDO array or a single value to be replaced
array $columns Optional array of columns to fetch
Returns:
array $array with Objects.
